turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. Could you help me order pizza from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, what kind of pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like four pizzas. Could I have a barbecue chicken pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: A chicken Alfredo pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Another pizza with just cheese and pepperoni.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And a fourth pizza with mushrooms and onions.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 4 pizzas, bbq chicken, alfredo special, a classic, and mushrooms and onions for the last one, right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any special toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the ones that I already gave you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great, that's going to be $46.50.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hold on a second. Could you make sure all the pizzas are large sizes? And I would like gluten-free crusts, and it's fine if that's extra.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Oh I'm sorry, that was for mediums. one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay, so it's going to be $85.60 for 4 larges with gluten free crust.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, sounds good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: perfect, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, that's great. Thank you so much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a great day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I appreciate your help.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: It's what I'm here for.
